text: All those infos are stored automatically by HubSpot under "Email information" section on contacts (there are various properties like "Email hard bounce reason", "Email address quarantine reason" etc)
HubSpot support says that "some portals were randomly choosen for the private beta as well"
(which makes no sense when you dont tell the account owner about it)

Hello! I am currently developing an app. I have been able to create timeline events on contacts for my test account, but the events do not seem to appear in the activity feed (I can only see “sample activity”). Why is this?
Best regards,
Philip
As far as I can see, I have not applied any filters.

Hi, good morning..my name is Vinicius, i need help to one case of vulnerability inside of one API allocated into HubSpot, but we do not have access to configuration because it is an external authority environment.

```How and with whom can I get help?```

I’m using the new blog Dnd functionality but i hit a wall that i can’t wrap my head around. in the editor i can freely drag and drop my module in, add the content and all is good, but as soon as i reload the page and/or preview the whole module is gone, reduced to atoms. Also can’t find it in the element inspector. Anyone faced this issue before?
The new cookie scanning functionality is great - but it seems to be crawling CTAs and including the cookies from the destination page. Anyone else seeing this?
hi i have a question, is there a way to search content through out all the landing pages?
I think the "simplest" solution is to pull the landing pages locally on your machine and leverage VS Code to search through all files.
